text: Athani Composite PU College is a pre-university college in Davangere, Karnataka, India.Retrieved from Google Maps https://www.google.com/maps/place/Deeksha,+SS+Layout,+Davangere/@14.453072,75.90017,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xfc057edc68e412f!8m2!3d14.4530724!4d75.9001699?hl=en- GB It is affiliated to Karnataka Pre-University Education Board.Retrieved from [Department of Pre University Education, Karnataka] http://pue.kar.nic.in/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/GD.pdfIt is located at 10th cross, A Block in S S Layout. .Retrieved from Sicivil.ksponline.co.in http://sicivil.ksponline.co.in/PDF/HomeDisplayCentreSchedule.pdf ==Streams offered== The College offers courses in the below mentioned science streams 1\. PCMB - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology. 2\. PCMC - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computer Science. ==Facilities== 1\. Laboratories 2\. Library 3\. Well- equipped classrooms 4\. Sports grounds ==References== Category:Pre University colleges in Karnataka
title: Athani Composite PU College
